nodes.text: Tips and Tactics is an online column published on the Wizards of the Coast website. It was written by Owen K.C. Stephens and aimed at showing how to use various rules together, suggesting new ways to use old rules, and clarifying complex rules. The column created a small number of new additions to the Star Wars universe.

The first edition covered the Star Wars Roleplaying Game, the second edition focused on the Star Wars Miniatures Game, and the third edition covered both the new Star Wars Roleplaying Game Saga Edition and the Star Wars Miniatures Game.
